mews.epw.epw module

EPW - Lightweight Python package for editing EnergyPlus Weather (epw) files. EPW is not the EPW downloaded from pypi.org, it must be downloaded from https://github.com/building-energy/epw

EPW License

class mews.epw.epw.epw[source]

Bases: object

A class which represents an EnergyPlus weather (epw) file.

read(fp)[source]

Reads an epw file.

Parameters

fp (str) – The file path of the epw file

write(fp)[source]

Writes to an epw file.

Parameters

fp (str) – The file path of the new epw file
